import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "", }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Form submission logic will be implemented later alert("ကျေးးဇူးတင်ပါသည်! ကျွန်ုပ်တို့ မကာမီ ပြန်လည်ဆက်သွယ်ပါမည်။"); console.log("Form submitted:", formData); }; return (
